name: Lunar Ace
description:
Welcome to Lunar Ace!

In this game, you earn points by avoiding rocks, collecting coins and staying alive. Help the cosmonaut and let us know your high score!

Controls:

Mobile: tap each side of the screen to move the cosmonaut. There is also (untested) controller support, if you feel like flying around using the shoulder buttons or the d-pad.

Created with Unreal Engine in under one month.

Credits:

Juliano Reis - Game Design, UX/UI Design, Art, Programming

Vitória Steckel - Additional Game Design, Quality Assurance

Special thanks:

Bruno Duarte Barrero - Playtesting and Feedback

Rafael Brum - Technical Assistance
